statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'john@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT TOP 10 customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT MIN(customer_id) AS min_id, MAX(customer_id) AS max_id FROM customers;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) AS avg_id FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' OR customer_name = 'Bob';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email NOT LIKE '%hotmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.name, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id;
SELECT c.name, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, price FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.customer_id = Products.product_id;

SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;

SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_price > 100;
SELECT team_name, leader_name, phone_number FROM SalesTeam WHERE leader_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, product_name, price, order_date, total_price FROM Customers C JOIN Orders O ON C.customer_id = O.customer_id JOIN Products P ON O.product_id = P.product_id;
